general_advisory: Farmers are advised to grow short duration Rabi crops like Green gram, Black gram, Cowpea, Field pea, Lentil, Groundnut, Toria and Sunflower in medium/shallow lowlands utilizing the available soil moisture in the field. Farmers are advised to visit their crop fields regularly to check pest infestation.

advisory: To manage wilt and rot disease in groundnut, use Mancozeb 64% WP or 10 ml Tebuconazole mixed in 10 litres of water.
To manage wilt and rot disease in Brinjal, drench the root zone with a solution of 10g Plantomycin mixed in 10 litres of water.
To manage wilt and rot disease in Tomato, drench the root zone with a solution of 10g Plantomycin mixed in 10 litres of water.
For ear head caterpillar management in Paddy, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5% EC @ 400 ml/acre or Profenophos 50% EC @ 400 ml/acre.
For Gundhi Bug Management in Paddy, spray Chlorpyriphos 20% EC @ 400 ml/acre or Malathion 50% EC @ 400 ml/acre by mixing in 200 litres of water.
To manage fruit fly in cucurbits, prepare a poison bait by mixing 400 gram Jaggery and 8 ml DDVP in 4 litre of water.
For internode borer management in Sugarcane, use Trichogramma chilonis card @ 1/acre weekly.
To manage fruit fly in Cucurbits, prepare a poison bait by mixing 400 gram DDVP in 4 litre of water.
For fertilizer management in Cole Crop, apply 33 kg of Urea and 23 kg of MOP per acre after hoeing.
Spray micronutrient Boron after transplanting and before curd formation.
To manage Red Spider Mites in Marigold, spray wettable sulphur 80% WP @ 2 gram/litre of water.
To manage Red Spider Mites in Rose, spray wettable sulphur 80% WP @ 2 gram/litre of water.
